verbs.description: [ARG0: The current Donald Trump] [V: needs] [ARG1: to listen to the Donald Trump who predicted in 2004 that American intervention in the Mideast would make things worse]

The current Donald Trump needs to listen to the Donald Trump who predicted in 2004 that American intervention in the Mideast [V: would] make things worse
The current Donald Trump needs to listen to the Donald Trump who predicted in 2004 that [ARG0: American intervention in the Mideast] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: make] [ARG1: things worse]
